website_summaries.verdict: Indoor evaporative air cooler, i.e., "swamp cooler," for low humidity regions.
pros: Perfect for spot-cooling small to medium-size rooms in hot and dry climates with less than 60% humidity
Saves energy (operates at only 230W), while maximizing airflow (470 CFM)
Cleans air with activated carbon air filter
Adjustable humidification dial, remote control, low-water alert, timer to keep energy cost down
cons: Continually re-filling the water supply can be a chore

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, to begin with the cooler feels cheap (which is not right for a 200 dllrs product) but I could have lived with that. The horror started when I was filling the tank with water (which was taking forever) and then before it even filled to the MIN water required line it started leaking everywhere! My whole kitchen was flooded within seconds! This is pure garbage. Please do yourself a favor and DO NOT BUY. Shame on Amazon and Honeywell for selling expensive and useless garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase especially not with Protection Plan it doesn't work either!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a zero I would purchased this unit along with the Protection Plan within a couple of weeks power button did not work I'm 65 year old widow that I was making a good purchase for over $200 BUT with two weeks power button stopped working. Call Auserion protection I purchase they put it make on Amazon. NO SOLUTION wast of $$$$!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiowa

customer_reviews.title: ... she wouldn't have to run the air conditioner so cool. It gets pretty humid unless you put it ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this to put in our daughter-in-law's room so she wouldn't have to run the air conditioner so cool. It gets pretty humid unless you put it in front of an open window. It's too hot to have the window open. I now use it in my garage in the mornings to work out on my weight machine. It does a good job but still needs to be put in front of a door that lets the heat in.
customer_reviews.author: Jody H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even bother!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these last July and neither has made it past the one year mark. The first one started making this high pitch screeching noise and then just stopped working after having it for ten months. I contacted Honeywell and after a few emails back and forth they replaced it. Now 4 weeks later the other one is doing the same thing. I can understand maybe getting one unit that doesn’t work but two? Obviously they’re built to last only a short time. For $200 I expect it to last longer than that. Don’t even waste your money on this junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works well, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after burning up my A/C compressor of my new RV under the West Texas temperatures of 110+degrees.Luckilu, it was under warranty but I still had hail my trailer 6 hours away to the dealership where I bought it for repair. My job requires me to work 14 days straight and 6 off so This is my home away from home when working and I can’t just take it over to the repair shop. This Honeywell product works well & saves me from burning up the compressor again. Noise level is about a 3 because it takes some getting used to. Still, it’s better then trying to stay in a hotbox if your AC burns up.
customer_reviews.author: Tadder

customer_reviews.title: FIRST USE WARNING
customer_reviews.text: FIRST USE WARNING ....This has an overpowering odor at first use. I suggest running it outside or at least blowing the output outside for a few hours before using it for indoor cooling. Mine has been running for an hour and the odor is less but still such that I would not want to sleep in the bedroom where I have it. IT IS REALLY STINKING UP THE HOUSE! But as the manual says, I'm sure it's temporary. Otherwise, it's taking in 93 degree Arizona air at 10% humidity from the window and blowing it in at 69. I like it, but PHEW right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mickelbrew

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: It is rather loud on high setting, but overall this is a nice cooler. I use it in my home gym and it works amazingly well. I have seen other reviewers photos and reviews and think they may have received used/refurbished models or something. I have not had any issues with leaking or anything else with this cooler. It is priced rather high given a portable air conditioner is only a few dollars more. But with this I don't have to vent the machine since there are no windows in my garage/gym. This works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It makes the room humid, not cool.
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good device but it didn't fill my needs at all. I bought it thinking it would cool a room off in my house. It didn't do that, even when i filled it with ice. It made the room unbearably humid and became dangerous when my daughter fell asleep in the room with the humidifier on and the door closed. We are very lucky when I opened the door and got her out. I didn't have a thermometer in there but the room was way too hot and humid. Once again, it probably did what it was supposed to but did not fit my needs at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on those hot nights
customer_reviews.text: It is quite big but it makes those miserably hot day and nights in the desert nice and cool. It does get humid in a closed room but thats what I expected. It is BIG! This is no small fan. It takes up basically a door way (thats how wide it is) but dont let the size stop you from getting it because it cools our 150 sqft room in seconds. It goes for about 8 hours on low before a little gurgle because it is low on water. Great machine though! *I have had it about a month and it still works like new with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't read the description enough
customer_reviews.text: This machine looks like a robot in my room - larger than I expected and much noisier. I was dismayed by the instruction of keeping a window or door open next to it. Why can't I recirculate room air? I wanted to use only distilled water, than realized it will get expensive to do so. I have had the unit for several days now... and the past two nights I have slept than in a long time. The humidified air makes a great difference.
customer_reviews.author: Casa de Mis Suenos

customer_reviews.title: All the bells and whistles !
customer_reviews.text: While the unit is not small, everything is in the right place. The ice compartment on top, a detatchable side holster for the remote, washable carbon filter and a replacable cellulose filter, and an alarm for low water level. There are modes and levels I haven't even needed yet- the fan is great at the low setting, and even in relatively high humidity it has cooled the air at least 15 degrees. I am hard to please, and I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Holland

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. I live in Denver and its very ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I live in Denver and its very dry, so this is supposed to be ideal. It only brings down the temperature a few degrees while making the humidity go up by 40 to 50 percent, so it actually feels worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This saved my sanity during the recent heat wave here in Northern California. The full tank lasts almost a full day on medium or low settings, and when you add ice in the top compartment, it feels like you have the AC on. When the temperatures were in the 90s outside, it kept my apartment at a very comfortable high 70s. So glad I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: alessandra

customer_reviews.title: It did fine in our bedroom and small living room
customer_reviews.text: Our AC went out here in Tucson before monsoon season. It was 115 outside and close to 90 inside. Cranked this puppy up and it cooled things down quickly. It did fine in our bedroom and small living room. We just closed off some spaces and made sure it had good air circulation. We tried it with ice and it was cooler BUT the sound of melting ice falling around was too annoying. It works well in this dry heat. And we realized it is great for my husbands snoring, haha, bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ATAZ

customer_reviews.title: trouble with pump by the end of first season.
customer_reviews.text: My unit began experiencing problems with the pump running briefly, then within 5 seconds I would see the lights on the control panel begin to flicker, then the pump would shut down and the beeper begin to beep. Could not have the pump run more than 5 seconds without needing to unplug the unit briefly to reset it. it would run as a fan, without the pump, but then there is no evaporative cooling occuring.
customer_reviews.author: David West

customer_reviews.title: I was absolutely delighted with this swamp cooler - for two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely delighted with this swamp cooler - for two weeks. I was using it to cool a guest bedroom in our Utah cabin. Conditions are perfect for an evaporative cooler: very low humidity. After two weeks, however, the cooling function has failed. The unit is NOT empty. I have kept it filled. I am trying draining it and restarting . . . but the low water beep sounds and cooling stops. I worry that I spent this money for just two weeks of cool air.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I ordered this product, I thought my family and I were going to have a cool summer but I was wrong, It doesn't work as good as I thought, you can add water and ice but the air still does not come out cold or as cold as you would imagine. Over all I'm not satisfied, I ordered the cooler late April when temperature's were still cool so I didn't really get to test it in hot weather now that its early June and I'm able to test it I see that it doesn't work as good as id hope for, pretty upset I cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: adriana nieto

customer_reviews.title: Filled a big need perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to cool the bunnies and ferrets we keep in our Las Vegas garage. We had even resorted to diverting the flow from the laundry room into the garage, but it wasn't nearly enough. Did some research, and found that this model seemed to be the Consumer Reports Number One rated item. The animals absolutely love it. It is a big water sucker, and you have to make sure you fill the multi-gallon tank twice a day. A Consumer Reported "flaw" was that the ice container at the top wasn't big enough. True, but the cold air that comes through without the ice is more than enough. So far, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Len Czyzniejewski

customer_reviews.title: Strange Odor Coming When COOL is turned on.
customer_reviews.text: I have a major problem with the cooler I received. There is a Strange Odor that comes from the cooler when I turn on the COOL switch. It's not like something burning. It's like there is a chemical in the filter and it makes it hard for me to breathe. I am in final stages of COPD, so this makes it worse on me instead of better. I hope there is something that can be done to fix this because I need the cooler. It's replacing one I had that went out on me.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for mild temperatures but not above 90!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, it is a good cooling fan and more effective than a regular standing fan. BUT it is not as good for super high heat with any kind of humidity. I live in Los Angeles and it wasn’t enough to cool down my small apartment living room once the temperature reached above 90. This summer we had major heat waves and it made the room more humid. If you can afford it, I would consider investing in a portable AC unit instead.
customer_reviews.author: njk

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my guitar making workshop. It works very well and pushes out alot of humidity. If you use it in a dusty environment, put another cheap filter (the ones that cost like $3) over the back so the water stays clean- otherwise there is basically no real barrier to stop the water turning into dust mud. Its a shame it doesn't have an onboard humidity reader
customer_reviews.author: Tis I Sir

customer_reviews.title: Good at blowing air and large water capacity also good ...
customer_reviews.text: Good at blowing air and large water capacity also good however is very noisy, should have a slower fan speed option. We live in a dry climate and it just doesn’t cool our small bedroom much at all. Seems to only lower the temp a couple of degrees. Will opt for a small window ac unit next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Seguin

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Quiet and cools too!
customer_reviews.text: Box had been thru hell, busted up styrofoam, but item was in fine shape. No smell at all during first use. It's not a small unit (42 pints) good rollers, quiet. Stuck remote on it's click in area and it fell into water compartment, so be careful about that. So far, 4 days, it's cooling fine. Great for New Mexican climate, especially when it's above 90 and swamp cooler on roof starts blowing hot air. Delivery was delayed about 5 days, was ok, just really needed it in this 100 degree desert climate.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN VOGLE

customer_reviews.title: not very cold
customer_reviews.text: doesn't get very cold unless you put ice DIRECTLY in with the water chamber. If you put it in the top section, where the ice goes, it only lasts about 10-15 minutes and then its not cold anymore. works better to put it in the bottom with the water. Is kind of noisy to have in our bedroom to sleep with
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well in Desert Heat
customer_reviews.text: Once I followed the somewhat unclear instructions on how to get it up and running, this product works quite well. I'd give it five stars, except that the directions were unclear about getting best results by placing it directly nearby a window, instead of the unclear picture of being between two windows for air flow. Otherwise, it works well, especially in the summer, desert heat in which I reside upwards of 90-110°.
customer_reviews.author: TUCHEH P STONE

customer_reviews.title: Not for Indoors Unless You Have a Ton of Cross Ventilation!
customer_reviews.text: If you use this cooler indoors without a ton of cross ventilation you are screwed! If enclosed without open windows or doors this will only make your room a super swampy hot humid room - No cooling whatsoever. Be warned, this can only be used for a very specific situation. Very deceiving advertising. They should make it absolutely clear that this will not cool your room whatsoever unless you have a heavy amount of cross ventilation. Don't believe the photos where it's just sitting in the middle of a closed room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Start making screeching noise after very light usage in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The cooler start making high pitch screeching noise after light use for 2 years (mild Seattle weather). For $200+ dollars I expect better. I could have gone with cheaper brand but I paid extra for Honeywell thinking it will last longer. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bennet K

customer_reviews.title: We like the fact that fresh air is always being circulated ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this model for about 2 weeks. We have noticed a difference in room temperature and comfort level even during several days of humid 90 plus degree weather. We like the fact that fresh air is always being circulated and doors and windows can remain open. Appears to be more energy efficient ~ however, we have not viewed a recent electric bill yet ~ but so far we recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nott Cott Designs

customer_reviews.title: Cool breeze for the summer
customer_reviews.text: Really drop the temperature of the room. Our house is too big to keep the air conditioning on all day long. Great fan to drop the temperature of the room when there are not too many people. My son uses it in his computer room and it really cools down the room. Love it! will probably buy another one for other parts of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna C.

customer_reviews.title: it’s really good product. It’s arrived in good packaging
customer_reviews.text: it’s really good product. It’s arrived in good packaging. When I started used it, it’s smell really strange and I almost return it. But after 4/5 days, it’s all good. For the remote control, it’s not bad , just one button that didn’t work. The cooling system and fan, it’s really great and it’s all cool in this summer. It’s better if it’s near window or door that can left open so that the hot air from behind it can leave the room.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: I only bought it for like two weeks and it starts smells like fish and ...
customer_reviews.text: I only bought it for like two weeks and it starts smells like fish and I did some research online and I found out that there's a mat inside the cool which made in paper. That thing will cause when you don't clean it regularly and it's not like you can just take it out but remove so many parts of the coor to do that. It just crazy. Absolutely not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Timon i.

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Cooler
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful machine. I use it to keep cool during the summer months and it does just that. With ice it can make the air freezing which feels so good when it is hot! No issues yet and I have been using it daily for the last two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I live in Northern CA which gets really hot and dry during the summer. The product is not as good as I thought it would be. It keeps a smaller area within a large room relatively cool, but it's definitely no air conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Star Quest

customer_reviews.title: Cools the room, but is very large
customer_reviews.text: It cools one room in the house a little, but not drastically. It has definitely improved our sleeping situation because our air conditioner is broke and our house does not get a decent air flow, but it is a pretty large unit. It rolls easily. We have not used the remote control yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my situation
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my situation. I put it somewhat close to my open room door aimed at me and open the window in front of me to allow airflow to move pass me and then through the window. The summer suffering in my room is no more. Don't expect it to cool down a whole house. Also, humidity will build up if there isn't decent air flow through the room or if the air outside is humid. I live in Southern California in an area that reaches 110F+ and its been great so far. Hopefully it continues to function correctly but I will edit this post when the the pump or fan goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Works average, cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with cracks on the base around the wheel casters and with non working display controls. When plugged in the fan runs, without the "power"being on to the unit. Remote is easy to use, but came unattached with no hardware to attach. Seems to cool the room but that really can't be determined until the weather turns warmer.
customer_reviews.author: ryanisabox

customer_reviews.title: Ice Really Doesnt Help!
customer_reviews.text: While this is a very good product overall the only issue I have is with it blowing cool air not expecting cold just cool in the Texas heat and that is with adding ice to the top of the machine. In temperatures under 85 degrees it works great, above 85 but less than 95 it works fair and above 95 it seems a waste of time to even plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for use in low humidity areas.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but only in Low humidity environments. And you must have decent airflow. This will not work in a closed room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quon

customer_reviews.title: works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This machine does exactly what it states that it does. If you read the listing information it is very clear that it is NOT an air conditioner. It is also NOT a fan.....it is somewhere in between. The ice option works well....the ice melts fast but it adds an extra layer of coolness to the air. I live in the Southwest desert and the humidity is low....works great here.
customer_reviews.author: London B

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With My Coolbot!
customer_reviews.text: This works great here in the Southwest! It's pretty lightweight when not filled with water. I 100% recommend this if you're in the right climate.
customer_reviews.author: Asphalt

customer_reviews.title: Good job Honeywell
customer_reviews.text: Circulates cool air easily. Can be rolled from room to room, I added essential oil, not a good idea the scent came out funky but eventually cleared. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anglim

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I may be returning this. Although it does cool, I would have appreciated a few more posts on the fact that this thing spits water everywhere. I had to put a plastic tray under it because it was leaking, luckily for me I thought of that before I plugged it in. Also, most photos that I see have it sitting in the middle of the room, when, in fact, it needs to be close to an open window. I will give it a few more days but if I don't see improvement this will be coming back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Wallace

customer_reviews.title: The other worked fine but arrived slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One had a fault and water flowed too fast which cuaused it to spray water everywhere flossing the floor. The other worked fine but arrived slightly damaged. Only works well if room small and not too hot otherwise you just get very humid. So small room and not crazy hot you will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Stephen darling

customer_reviews.title: Great little swamp cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing roughly a few years, bought in like 2017 and had no issues at all so far and being in Montana it works wonders. The water part for cooling is great but it takes a few minutes to actually feel the cool assuming you don the rocket the valve all the way. Filling take a couple pitchers unless you got a hose from sink or washer hookup. Cheaper than real a/c but so far worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McNair

customer_reviews.title: What idiot designed the controls for this thing?
customer_reviews.text: In terms of functionality and effectiveness I have no complaints, it does what it claims to do. The issue is with the controls. They work but on both the unit and the remote they are printed with black text on a black background, rendering them invisible under nearly all lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Healing

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for the price
customer_reviews.text: The cool air feels amazing. It's been so hot lately and everywhere in town Evap coolers were sold out. Then I stumbled upon this cooler on amazon and I had to have it. The ice compartment is a nice touch, being separate from the water tank makes it convienent for how cold I actually want the air. The water pressure lever is nice to. It helps make the cool air last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Water viewer does NOT show water level!
customer_reviews.text: Information on water seems to be a secret. Nowhere does it say how much to put in for minimum. Where does it say that viewer will NOT show water level, but has a long white float which is supposed to appear in viewer? Since my float didn't appear for a good 8 hours AFTER overfilling unit & running it all day, I'd think that info should be included. If it doesn't do a better job of cooling after a full day of use, I'll be removing stars.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peachey

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We really love the ice compartment so you can really cool down the water. It has great wheels to move it around and works real well even on hot days. It came packed very well and there was no damage. We love this addition to our fifth wheel. It saves electricity from having to turn on the A/C. Sharp looking also.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy149

customer_reviews.title: Garage / outdoor preferred. Smells
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this in your house. Garage or outdoors only. Way too muggy and smelly. The fan by itself is strong. The ice tank melts fast and it’s no longer cold
customer_reviews.author: Drew82

customer_reviews.title: Awful Appliance or Bad Unit Received
customer_reviews.text: Received this awful cooler and cannot use it. 1) the swing button worked 1 time - does not work any longer; and, 2) The main reason is the horrible odor it emits. Right out of the box, when turning it on it has a horrible smell and had to literally fumigate the smell out of the house for two days. Perhaps just the one I received since I do not see any others commenting on the smell. Can't use it and too much a pain to try to return ship it back. No more Honeywell appliances for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Even at that it works FANTASTICALLY and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I got a damaged box (I knew this when I ordered it and got a hell of a discount). Even at that it works FANTASTICALLY and I'm very happy with it! It has an area to put ice to help cool the water even more. I use plastic ice cubes. It cools our living room with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tmc

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cooler till the time it's working Bought it twice ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cooler till the time it's working Bought it twice through Amazon.first time don't take protection plan n it stopped working in just 10 months....all the money got wasted Bought second time with protection plan and again stopped working within a year But thank God took protection plan....that company reimbursed my money
customer_reviews.author: Jyotsanaa

customer_reviews.title: An attractive and sturdy unit, very safely packaged with clear instructions for ...
customer_reviews.text: An attractive and sturdy unit, very safely packaged with clear instructions for use. The variable speed fan is sufficient for cooling purposes before the temperature heats up and when it does, the cooling system works remarkably well. I am extremely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Norcross

customer_reviews.title: Energy efficient
customer_reviews.text: Works great for dry weather climate. Little loud. Moves cool air great in a 200 square foot room. Deodorizer is a must. Tank storage is quite large. 10 hrs continuous on a full tank.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for an hour. It has already cooled down my apartment. Very easy to use. It's a little louder than I had hoped but still not bad. So far I'm glad I got this. Will write another review once I've had it a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment either with what it should be doing and with what it seems to be not working.
customer_reviews.text: There is no water tank, it is only the shell to contain the water, leaking when it reaches the seams. We could never operate it using the water evaporation, but only as a fan. On top of everything, the louvres never oscillated even when that option is activated, they seem to be stuck in the original position. We wanted to return it, but due to commitments outside of town, when I was to do it the return period had expired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great at cooling
customer_reviews.text: This unit is by FAR not the best on the market. Not sure how or why, but it deosn't put out like another unit I bought at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I like this unit
customer_reviews.text: The lowest fan setting is still quite high and it's fairly loud. But it cools my room effectively and is really easy to move from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Noooo instruction No remote Wouldn’t stay on It had water in it when we got it It was junk
customer_reviews.author: Jpatt

customer_reviews.title: It's great as long as it's not a heatwave
customer_reviews.text: It's great as long as it's not a heatwave....only good indoors with weather between 80F- 90F. Cannot move unit once you turn on water/cooler it will spill all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tanco

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Not an A/C but definitely better than just a fan. Blows cold with cold water and ice, plenty of air. I am so happy I bought this for hot Fresno days!
customer_reviews.author: munstah

customer_reviews.title: Fan stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 3 months and the fan stopped working. Will see if it is still covered by Honeywell. Update: Sending in a claim for repair or replace. Update: 7/22/19 The replacement cooler just broke down again. The fans in these units don't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Won't be a new model even though it says new
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty much useless it'll only make the room 1-2 degrees cooler, other than that its like hot air blowing at you.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work in Central Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work at all for me in Central Minnesota. I'm not sure if it's only because of the humidity rate in my area. Even in higher humid area, I think it still should work a little. But my one just did not cool up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Avik Mallik

customer_reviews.title: Its ok!
customer_reviews.text: Kids use it and refill the ice quite often but they like it so far. When it's not to hot is really gets their room cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars I would. It leaked all over my floors and didn't ever work. It was horrible! Definitely don't recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Bought for a second story that get hot when heat temps are high in summer. Works great !!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Cools one room adequately.
customer_reviews.text: Life saver in summer heat. Fan also very effective when not necessary to cool the air. I use distilled water so I don't have to clean it as often as recommended. It looks a little flimsy but has held up well for one season of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: the cooler pushes out cool air - and emits large water drops resulting in ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the unit today and began filling with water - the water fill indicator shows no water in unit! Swamp cooler leaks water from the side. Additionally, the cooler pushes out cool air - and emits large water drops resulting in wet wood floors! Perhaps a defective unit? I have contacted seller and will wait for a response before editing this review. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cooler was very well packaged. Difficult to believe ...
customer_reviews.text: The cooler was very well packaged. Difficult to believe how fast it was delivered. Ordered it on the 4th and received it in the afternoon on the 6th. This is my first time at using an indoor Evaporative Cooler. Have it running right now, outdoor temperature 80 degrees, humidity is 26 % and I'm very impressed with it. Will see how it does when it gets in the 90's. Oh, and I'm just using water no ice for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: This air cooler is amazing! It has been 95 degrees in my un-air ...
customer_reviews.text: This air cooler is amazing! It has been 95 degrees in my un-air conditioned house and this cooled it down 15 degrees instantly. When I add ice to it, it blows out super cold air.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Package and unit were damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Package and unit were damaged, but no effect on performance. I believe the damage was done by the delivery company, but didn't notice until a day after I received it. Since it performed fine, i didn't feel it was necessary to go through the hassle of reporting it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Starkiller

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well for me. I have it in my garage and I sit right in front of it during the 80-100+ degree CA days. I use small ice packs (lunch box size) to cool the water. My only complaint is that I have to unscrew a bunch of screws to clean it. I'm not likely to do that often so it probably won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I expected. It's not AC but it cools our living room down nicely. Has saved us through this hot Denver heat. Very happy with the 42 Pt.
customer_reviews.author: Eulogy

customer_reviews.title: Need ice
customer_reviews.text: Works alright, but barely cools more than a regular fan unless you put ice in it. It cools pretty well after ice is included, but that should be specified in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Buy two if you can
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought it would be but easy to move if you have to. Instructions were easy to follow. I love it 😍 Thinking of buying another one when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that after "ONE" month of usage that the air cooler started making screeching noises and is now unable to function properly as the description provides. I really spent over $200 on a device that cannot simply blow air but wake me up and give me ptsd when it screeches like a five year old kid screaming.
customer_reviews.author: sod

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t cool the room as hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to cool a small-medium sized office but it made next to no impact on really hot days. Maybe the room was too big, maybe it was too hot. Either way, I’m very unhappy with the results. I would have been better off buying a strong fan and sucking the hot air out of the office.
customer_reviews.author: Joffrey Bywater

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until I didn't
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2-3 weeks and was loving it. Worked great at keeping me cool. Then, 3 days after the return window closed, the machine began spitting water out of the front grill. Now I can't use it anymore. So disappointing. Honestly, I noticed from the beginning that it felt a little flimsy. Guess I was right.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nutik Zitter

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. Haven't had it a long time but so far it's working great. I'm about 40 miles from Palm Springs, Ca. so the air is hot and dry right now and this really makes a difference. It's not an air conditioner but a lot cheaper to run. I will update later on if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Buy the warranty
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but mine stopped working about 10 months after buying this... make sure buy warranty
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have but wish it were quieter and better designed
customer_reviews.text: Kept air cooler than usual, but loud. Also, it would be great to have a better way/ easier access to clean the water tank. I don’t care about remote control except it can easily fall into the water tank! Not sure on the efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Chari Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: best thing going
customer_reviews.text: we have enjoyed this unit in our bed room does not cool like AC but keeps it fairly cool good fan
customer_reviews.author: Carole M.

customer_reviews.title: i have terrible cough for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I never open and use right away cause It''s not hot.. when i use it seem It is ok, i always cleaned and drained the water... i have terrible cough for 3 weeks.. i though im ok with my cough still cming on off.. maybe because off the smell Cming from the air thats i stop Using right now . im Not reallly happy about this item.. Can i returned this item even i bought this Last May 2017...
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: it is really noisy. the water is leaking and splashing
customer_reviews.text: it is really really noisy. and don't be fooled by the instruction that says pour water until the minimum. the water will be leaking from the side if you do that. just pour water until reach the cylinder thingy. and while it's working, drops of water keep splashing from the fan.
customer_reviews.author: marieta

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep the room cool
customer_reviews.text: This product takes lots of water and ice. Does not keep the room cool. Save your money and purchase a real cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered swamp cooler after recommendations from friend, so glad I did. Works great, easy to use after I scanned QR code to see video. Wish they offered the same video on product page, went back and forth on model to select, but there were no videos I could access easily. Main decisions on which model were: Price, reviews & ease of use, portable. One slight negative, friends recommended put a frozen water bottle in reservoir vs ice, however the area is too small to insert a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Haney

customer_reviews.title: Package was not as described
customer_reviews.text: Description was I am like new was scratched up Parts are broken packaging was horrible one star
customer_reviews.author: gibz

customer_reviews.title: Better than forced air
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We only have one for now and it’s good for the living room, May get another for other end of the house along with a open window or door works well.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our small house!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! We have one in our bedroom and one in our kids room, we use them with black out curtains and our rooms stay nice and cool! The low setting works fine, so the noise level isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Brought it last year in July 2019, as of the last week has started making loud noises - unable to operate. Didn't even last 2 summer seasons. Does not seem to be durable, not worth buying. Unfortunately, I didn't get the additional warranty when purchasing last year.
customer_reviews.author: Kedar M.

customer_reviews.title: This room cooler is a workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully effective. This product works. But as recommended by the manufacturer, it's best suited to dry, low-humidity climates. I'm in Arizona - hot but dry.
customer_reviews.author: AJL

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cooler for a week and it seems that it is of high quality and cools very well in our hot climate. I don't think it is too noisy and very easy to set up and run.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bangert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, damaged my carpets
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, I woke up in the middle of the night with soaking wet carpets as water was spitting out of the fan/vent area. Had to get a wetvac to suck up all the water. Do no recommend buying this product. Cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Polite

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase this year
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable air conditioner for my living room. This fit the bill. Great investment and it works very well for a small area.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: The smaller the space the better (AND) use ice
customer_reviews.text: It works but you got to have it on for quite awhile until you feel a degree change in your space that it is working. The smaller the space the better (AND) use ice.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Cool summers
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. I'll be getting one for every room.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Mc

customer_reviews.title: Bummer it just did not work for the room we tried it in.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work....... used a lot of water and never cool a small room down. Bummer that it cannot be returned. I have had it for 8 days and tried to use it one time and it just will not cool the room at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, NAUSIATING  smell from PROBABLY Toxic plastic.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE, NAUSIATING CHEMICAL ODOR! LEAKED ALL OVER THE CARPET WHEN WAS SWITCHED ON!!!!! MY HUSBAND AND I, BOTH OF US, GOT VERY BAD RUSH, AND SWELLINGS, WHICH COULD HAVE BEEN CAUSED BY THIS ODOR. ODOR COMES FROM THE COPARTMENT AS WELL AS FROM THE VENT! HOPE MIGTH HAVE BEEN TOXIC.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: It cost me a fortune to cool my house in Arizona summer heat. Im at work all day and bought this for the kids room. Works perfect. Affordable and cools to a nice temperature. Saving me on cooling bill. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

product_meta.title: Honeywell 470-760CFM, Fan & Humidifier with Ice Compartment & Remote, CL201AE, Silver Indoor Portable Evaporative Cooler, 470 CFM
product_meta.description: Color:SilverLike a breeze flowing across a lake, Honeywell Evaporative Coolers provide a natural, cool breeze with the power of water evaporation. Honeywell Evaporative Coolers combine 3 appliances: Evaporative air cooler, fan and humidifier - into one compact energy-saving system. A fan alone creates a breeze by recirculating warm air, but when you add water and/ice to the tank, Honeywell Evaporative Coolers reduce the temperature of incoming warm air, transforming it into a cool moist breeze. Honeywell Portable Air Coolers are built to last and carefully crafted with the science of aerodynamics to minimize energy consumption while maximizing the airflow. An evaporative air cooler offers an energy efficient cooling option when the air is hot with low humidity, such as desert areas like the southwestern United States (recommended humidity level is 60% or less for maximum efficiency). For those living in more humid cities, please consider Honeywell Portable Air Conditioners.
feature_bullets: Indoor evaporative air cooler or swamp cooler ideal for use in the southwest and Midwest regions of the US - Performs best in hot/dry climates where humidity levels are <60%
Super low power consumption 230W & powerful 470-760CFM airflow ideal for spot cooling small to medium spaces such as living room, bedroom, den, covered patio, garage
Carbon Dust Air Filter, Remote Control, Low water alarm, energy saving timer, Adjustable humidification dial & Ice compartment.
Moist, cool breeze can cool you down & be used as humidification during winter months.
NOT an Air Conditioner & NOT just a Fan – Evaporative Cooler reduces temperature through water evaporation. Mimic the comfort of a cool lake breeze in your home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars818 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Swamp cooler, remote control, manual, warranty
